permanent/constant/fixed/usual/ordinary/rule (old)/one of the 64 hexagrams of the Book of Changes (䷟)
surname Heng
spring (season)/gay/joyful/youthful/love/lust/life
surname Chun
Hengchun town in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Hengchun Peninsula in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], the southernmost point of Taiwan

sentences.english: The beginning era of the city means the time that Ching government reigned over Hengchun region officially.
sentences.chinese: 城市創始期指清國統治力正式進入恆春地區的期間。

sentences.english: It is supposed that the crust of the Hengchun Ridge is continental crust, which extends from the Hengchun Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 推測其地殼性質爲陸殼，是恆春半島的南延部分。

sentences.english: After middle stage of Showa period, the development of the walled city of Hengchun started going to the mature era of the city.
sentences.chinese: 大正中期以後，恆春城的發展開始進入城市成熟期。
